title: How to Eat a Buffalo Wing in One Bite
description:
Think wings are messy? Let Greg show you how to take one down in one bite in just a few seconds.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Follow Greg on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Get other Greg Vlogs here: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVuaj1jfPjoxFWh7vfK29UOe

Catch stuff like this via the #AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.
